mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_care_users ( users_number, care_intro_text, care_certificate_files_num, care_passbook_files_num, care_profiles_photo_number, care_accept ) VALUES ( #{usersNumber}, #{careIntroText}, #{careCertificateFilesNum}, #{carePassbookFilesNum}, #{careProfilesPhotoNumber}, NVL(#{careAccept}, 'N') )
